title: Tutorials 1 Basics
description: Access and analyze satellite-derived sea surface temperature using ERDDAP and NetCDF-based workflows. This tutorial demonstrates how to locate and subset a satellite SST product in ERDDAP, download gridded NetCDF data, examine its structure, and create basic spatial maps and regional time series. Users work with the NOAA Coral Reef Watch CoralTemp monthly sea surface temperature product to explore coordinate conventions, generate SST maps, compute regional averages, and visualize temporal variability.
py_img: tut1_1_py.png::Time series of sea surface temperature in the western North Atlantic Ocean along the US East Coast in 2022. | tut1_2_py.png::Map of the 2022 average sea surface temperature in the western North Atlantic Ocean along the US East Coast.
r_img: tut1_1_r.png::Time series of sea surface temperature in the western North Atlantic Ocean along the US East Coast in 2022. | tut1_2_r.png::Map of the 2022 average sea surface temperature in the western North Atlantic Ocean along the US East Coast.
m_img: tut1_1_m.png::Time series of sea surface temperature around the Hawaiian Islands in 2018. | tut1_2_m.png::Map of the 2018 average sea surface temperature in the Hawaiian Islands.

title: Make a virtual buoy with satellite data
description: Create a virtual ocean buoy using satellite data to extend or replace discontinued in situ observations. This tutorial demonstrates how to use ERDDAP to extract satellite sea surface temperature at a fixed location, build and clean a virtual buoy time series, resample the data to a lower temporal resolution, and analyze trends through visualization and linear regression. Data from NDBC Buoy 46259 are used alongside the NOAA GeoPolar Blended SST satellite dataset.
py_img: vbuoy_py.png::National Data Buoy Center buoy 46259 matched up with sea surface temperature data. | vbuoy2_py.png:: Trend analysis of buoy and satellite data.
r_img: vbuoy_r.png::National Data Buoy Center buoy 46259 matched up with sea surface temperature data. | vbuoy2_r.png:: Trend analysis of buoy and satellite data.
